biotools.summary: EEG-Beats is a matlab toolbox to analyze heart rate variability (HRV) from EKG measured with an EEG Sensor. This MATLAB toolbox extracts heartbeat peaks and interbeat interval measures from a single channel of EEG that has been recorded by placing an EEG sensor on the upper portion of the chest.

bioschemas.name: EEG-Beats
